name: Stars Hospital
description: Stars Hospital is a moderately equipped but poorly managed medical facility in Cassandra. While outwardly functional, it suffers from lax internal control, uneven security coverage, and signs of external interference with its digital systems. It is a critical investigative location connected to the handling of Lucifero's body (THE SECOND CASE VICTIM).

snapshot.name: Stars Hospital
snapshot.description: The hospital operates normally on the surface, with staff accustomed to routine police inquiries. Surveillance cameras cover most areas but leave exploitable blind spots. Certain internal departments—particularly medical storage and laboratories—are unusually well protected. The morgue records indicate suspicious recent activity related to THE SECOND CASE VICTIM (21-year-old Lucifero, December 22, 2003). IMPORTANT: The FIRST CASE victim (19-year-old girl, frozen in ice, December 22, 2002) was NEVER brought here.

characters.name: Vincent Galenus
characters.notes: Personally transported Lucifero's body (SECOND CASE VICTIM) to the crematorium according to hospital records. Possesses an ID card required to access restricted areas.

characters.name: Aberforth Locefern (Lucifero)
characters.notes: THE SECOND MURDER CASE VICTIM (December 22, 2003): 21-year-old Black girl, killed by gunshot and knife. Hospital records show the body was registered and then rapidly transferred out. The corpse is no longer in the morgue. DISTINCT from the first case victim (19-year-old girl, frozen in ice, December 22, 2002).

snapshot.keeperNotes: Stars Hospital handles THE SECOND CASE VICTIM (Lucifero, 21-year-old, December 22, 2003). CRITICALLY: The FIRST CASE victim (19-year-old girl, frozen in ice, December 22, 2002) was NEVER brought here—her body was found in the hotel freezer and the case was suppressed. Emphasize that investigators are dealing with TWO SEPARATE CASES with TWO DIFFERENT BODIES, exactly one year apart. The hospital only has records for the second case. Evidence here confirms deliberate concealment of the second victim and pushes the investigation toward Vincent and the crematorium. Use surveillance pressure and time sensitivity to increase tension.
permanentChanges: Lucifero's body (SECOND CASE VICTIM) is no longer accessible in the hospital once discovered missing
